title: Interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard in a dream or shaving a beard in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard in a dream. Follow the opinions of dream interpretation scholars, the most important of which is seeing Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin shaving his beard or shaving his beard in a dream. Shaving a beard in a dream. Seeing a beard in a dream from Ibn Sirin’s point of view indicates money and prestige for the man, while seeing a mustache indicates fame. And honor. Seeing yourself shaving your beard in a dream has many meanings, some good and some bad, and we will give you as many interpretations as possible. Seeing yourself shaving his beard may indicate that there are some crises in the dreamer’s life. Perhaps shaving the beard for a man may indicate his separation from his wife, It may indicate the recovery of the sick person and the payment of the debtor’s debt. Also, seeing a shaved beard indicates distance from God Almighty. See also: Gray hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard. Shaving a beard indicates that the dreamer has given up on some matters in his life. Shaving a beard for an unmarried girl may indicate... Her marriage or engagement with a good person in the near future. Seeing a married woman shaving her husband’s beard indicates her cooperation and support towards her husband. I see: Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair Shaving a beard for women in general indicates the end of problems and crises. Seeing half of a missing beard in a dream means poverty, but if shaving Half a beard - the dream shows the dreamer's enemies who are waiting for him and harming him. As for whoever sees his beard cut off, the dream indicates the disappearance of his wealth and position, and this is to the extent that his beard is cut off. The graying of the beard in a dream indicates the piety and status of the fortuneteller. If the beard is thick, the dream indicates that things will become easier. And paying off debts. Whoever believes that the decrease of his beard indicates a lack of money. Read about this: Interpretation of a dream about long hairInterpretation of a dream about hair loss Watch the video Interpretation of shaving a beard in a dream We provide you with an interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard in a dream, with sincere dream greetings from the site family. To interpret your dream, publish your dream Comment and we will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation and meaning of seeing soup in a dream in full?

preview.html: The complete interpretation of soup in a dream according to the books of major scholars explains dreams and visions. Therefore, we have selected for you all the correct and powerful facts and details about seeing soup. In a complete dream, in addition to seeing bird tongue soup in a dream in full, we also provide you with an interpretation of dream soup for the bowl, for married and pregnant women, as well as for men through the Hadout website, which specializes in the sciences of interpretation and jurisprudence. Why does Ibn Sirin dream of soup? Dream interpretation of soup is one of the visions Praiseworthy, which indicates support, kindness, and grace decisions. Seeing whole soup in a dream is evidence of the lawful money that the dreamer will earn and receive in his life as a whole. Drinking whole soup in a dream for a sick person is good news and a sign of a speedy recovery that he will enjoy soon, God forbid. Seeing and drinking soup for a person in trouble or a prisoner is a sign of getting rid of sadness and returning home. Why dream of soup for a single woman? Cooking soup in a dream for an ordinary woman indicates pleasant things that she is preparing and preparing for, and perhaps a happy marriage. Seeing soup for a girl in a complete dream is evidence of... It will fulfill many desires that will change the course of her life. Drinking whole soup in a dream is one of the dreams that a girl is looking for and it means happiness, joy and the fulfillment of desires and goals. Why does a married woman dream of soup? Seeing a married woman drinking soup in a dream means getting rid of all worries and problems and improving Her future circumstances. Moreover, the scene of preparing soup and presenting it to the husband indicates the end of all disputes between them, the settlement of issues and the stability of their married life in good health and security. Soup for a married woman in a dream indicates that she and her family as a whole will receive kindness and broad support. Whole soup in a dream for a woman For a married woman, it is also considered a harbinger of an imminent pregnancy and a cure for the chronic diseases that she suffers from. Why does a pregnant woman dream of soup? Why does she dream of soup in a dream? For a pregnant woman as a whole, it is evidence of safety and well-being and that childbirth will be easy and affordable for her. Seeing soup in a dream whole and offering it to the child indicates Improving his health condition and ensuring the child's health from all diseases and problems. Why dream of orzo soup? If we dream that we are eating orzo tongue, this means kindness and blessings, as well as many pleasant and happy events that surround the dreamer in his life. Orzo tongue in a dream is full of visions indicating good conditions and improvement In the case of the dreamer, whether in terms of money or health. Why dream of meat soup? This is evidence of getting rid of the problems and obstacles that surround the dreamer’s life, as well as a sign of his need to end his worries and sorrows. Serving soup in a dream is complete. Serving soup in a dream fully shows the degree of harmony between them and Love, as well as evidence of kindness and affection between him and the person who provided the soup. Dream of eating orzo Seeing a whole orzo in a dream and eating it in a dream is full of visions that show good and great support for the dreamer. Buying orzo

title: Interpretation of a dream about your husband cheating on another man: A dream about you cheating on your husband according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: BetrayalInterpretation of a dream of a husband cheating on a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream of a husband cheating on me in front of his wifeInterpretation of a dream of a husband cheating on his wife with her friendI dreamed that my husband cheated on me about Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of betrayal of a loverI dreamed that my husband cheated on me before my eyesI dreamed that my husband was cheating on me while I was pregnantInterpretation of a dream of repeated infidelityIf I see that you are cheating on your husband with another man in a dream or A dream, this indicates a disturbance in confidence. You suffer from a lack of self-confidence and you feel that your appearance has changed and you have lost your attractiveness. This may be due to something in your real life, such as gaining weight or neglecting yourself due to the busyness of life. So this dream does not indicate any problem. In your current marriage, it does not indicate any obstacle in your relationship with your wife, but rather the problem is from within you. You think that your man is no longer attracted to you, so you must strengthen your self-confidence and get rid of everything that could break your self-confidence. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a traffic light in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of dreams about seeing a lantern in a dream in detail. When a person sees a lantern in his sleep, he begins to think about the meaning of the vision, but many details lead to a difference in the interpretation of one dream for another due to the details of the dream itself, the psychological and social state of the dreamer, and the state of the lantern in the dream, and this is what we explain today in detail. Through the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a traffic light in a dream. Seeing a traffic light in a dream symbolizes a happy fortuneteller’s luck. It also indicates that the dreamer will in reality receive good offers regarding his work and personal life and he must wait for his choice and not lose it. Whoever dreams of carrying a Ramadan lantern, this is a sign of joy with people from About it.The meaning of seeing a lantern in a dream according to its shape. A lantern inside. Metal in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s dreams and goals, but they can only be achieved after hard work and diligence on the part of the dreamer. But the lantern is made of paper, where plastic means desires that are easy to achieve. The meaning of a dream of a lantern in a dream according to colorWho dreams of a red lanternColor It is a sign of high status at work, a big promotion and reward. Sheep Noir The color symbolizes the power and authority of the viewer. It also denotes strength, self-confidence, and self-confidence. Interpretation of a dream about a traffic light in a dream for a single woman. When a girl dreams of seeing a bright lantern in a dream, this indicates the approach of her marriage to a religious and moral man. White lanternIn his dream, he refers to emblems. A green light indicates marriage. A colored traffic light is yellow. It symbolizes the jealousy and envy that the dreamer experiences. The meaning of seeing a traffic light in a dream for a man. A man who dreams of a traffic light in a dream appears as the higher it is. For a married man, this indicates the presence of a good friend. As shown or as specified or as shown. Pride. Dignity and glory. As for seeing a dim, not bright lantern, it symbolizes the dreamer’s isolation from his work. It may indicate bad news. Dreaming of many traffic lights, this shows many sins. A lantern in a religious man’s dream shows strength. His faith and devotion to religion. The meaning of a dream about a traffic light in a pregnant woman’s dream. A bright lantern in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates the ease of childbirth, God willing. The black lantern symbolizes the newborn. Memory. The white lantern indicates childbirth. Female. Add the dream you want to interpret with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article. We will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an elevator in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing an elevator in a dream. An elevator is a means of transportation in which people and goods are transported vertically from top to bottom or vice versa from above, and this elevator is located in high-rise buildings. Buildings that facilitate climbing and comfort, and the person does not feel tired and stressed. If you see an elevator in a dream, this means a promotion at work or finding a job with a good salary. It also indicates achieving success and experience in academic or professional life. A dream of seeing an elevator by Ibn Sirin. As Ibn Sirin says in dream books, seeing an elevator in a dream portends good or evil. Whoever sees that he has climbed to the top, this indicates wealth or high status, while Seeing an elevator going down in a dream indicates problems and troubles for the dreamer. A dream of an unmarried girl going up in an elevator indicates her success and overcoming her crises. Seeing an elevator also suggests a promotion at work or marriage soon. Seeing an unmarried girl going up in an elevator symbolizes her good luck. As for her vision She goes down in the elevator and it turns out that he heard sad news about her. A married woman sees an elevator in her dream, and this indicates that her hopes will soon come true. She dreams of seeing an elevator for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman’s elevator bending indicates the birth of a girl. An elevator in a pregnant woman’s dream is a symbol of comfort and safety. A dream about seeing an elevator for a man: Seeing an elevator in a single person’s dream is a sign that he will get married soon. A married man, when he sees an elevator in a dream, indicates abundance of sustenance or predicts that his wife will have children. Seeing a long elevator in a dream for a married person symbolizes the cessation of some things, Including the cessation of a woman’s menstrual cycle or the cessation of childbearing. If you see an elevator in a dream, this means that its condition has stopped working. A single woman dreams of seeing an elevator. Seeing an electric elevator in a single woman’s dream means success and excellence in her academic or professional life. The elevator also indicates Overcoming adversity and crises. Climbing the top floor shows success and distinction and has reached the highest positions. Seeing a broken elevator is one of the bad and ugly dreams. A dream of a broken elevator indicates a delay in marriage. Riding in an elevator means the presence of people who help the viewer succeed. Seeing an elevator Climbing to the upper floors means that you have gone through difficult stages. Seeing the elevator going down quickly means financial losses. It indicates a failure in a romantic relationship or a breakup. It can indicate a breakdown in something and a lack of it. It can also indicate the lack of an academic qualification or the loss of an opportunity Work.Dream of seeing an elevator in a dream. Seeing the elevator riding on the dead indicates the many problems that the dreamer faces. It may indicate the approaching death. If a single girl sees herself driving an elevator in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of her desires and goals. The dream may indicate a warning about something that the dreamer must be careful about. Seeing the elevator stopping Suddenly it means that unpleasant news will reach the viewer and it may also indicate that he lost his job. Going down the stairs easily in a dream indicates the distinguished position that the dreamer obtains

title: Seeing unknown people in an unmarried woman’s dream and its interpretation by leading imams of interpretation

preview.html: Some people feel fear and dread of people they do not know and their presence around them, especially girls, and it is possible for a person to see people in a dream that he does not know. Seeing unknown people in a single woman’s dream. Many scholars have interpreted the interpretation of seeing unknown people in a dream for an unmarried woman as evidence that the girl is in a psychological state. Good, as she feels reassured and comfortable in the current period, and God is Most High and knows that. It is also said that this dream can be interpreted for an unmarried girl that she will achieve what she desires and achieve her goals in the near future, God willing, and God knows best. One of the senior scholars said that seeing one of the people Not knowing them in a dream interprets that God gives this girl a lot of goodness, God willing, and God knows best. Some interpretive scholars believe that if a single woman sees in a dream people she does not know chasing her, then this dream indicates that the dreamer is thinking a lot at this time and she feels confused and hesitant about some Her issues are at the moment. Time, and this dream comes to announce the end of that period in the near future, God willing, and God knows best. But if she sees some unknown people walking in the dream, then this dream tells her that she will receive good news that will make her happy soon, God willing, and God knows best. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about an attack A strange person. Interpretation of a dream about blowing a nose. Seeing strangers in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Seeing someone in a dream of strangers indicates that the dreamer feels confused, anxious, and unable to make the appropriate decision regarding any of his problems at the present time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It is said that this dream may indicate Some details indicate that the dreamer may be exposed to a financial crisis and lose some money in the coming period, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin says that this dream may indicate the poor psychological state of the pioneer and his excessive thinking about the debts that he is supposed to pay at this time, and God is Great and He knows that. But if One saw a group of strangers celebrating in a dream, then this dream says that the dreamer will have a good change that will make him happy in the coming period, and God knows best.Interpretation of seeing a group of men in a dreamMany interpretation scholars agreed that seeing someone in a dream with a group of men walking, This dream portends to the dreamer that he will receive news that will please him soon, God willing, and God knows best. Likewise, if someone sees in a dream a group of men going to the mosque or actually sees them in the mosque, then this dream is interpreted as good news for the pioneer and that a lot of good news will come to him soon. hopefully. And God knows best. Seeing people I know in a dream. One of the interpretation scholars said: Seeing a person in a dream is someone he knows, and that person is from the dreamer’s family. This dream indicates the strength of the relationship between the dreamer and this person in reality, and God knows best. But if one sees in a dream someone taking his things from him, then this dream tells the monarch that this person will do some actions that bother the fortuneteller, and God knows best. It is said that seeing someone in a dream giving him a shirt and in reality there are many

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets by Ibn Sirin in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about eating sweets by Ibn Sirin in a dream, the dreamer sees sweets in a dream heralds goodness, because he realizes their beauty in real life, and all interpreters agreed that sweets in a dream of all types and shapes show goodness and nourishment. It is one of the dreams that a person should be happy about. By seeing it and the great beauty hidden in it, it sometimes indicates evil, wickedness, and hypocrisy in a person’s life and those around him want evil for him, so we find that many want to know the correct interpretation of his sleep when he sees and eats sweets. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets by Ibn Sirin in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous scholars. Who worked on dream interpretation, and also worked to understand, clarify and interpret all the symbols present in the dream accurately so that the dream interpretation is correct. Sweets in a dream indicate an abundance of goodness, according to Ibn Sirin, and they have different meanings as follows: Eating sweets in a dream indicates that a person will enjoy a beautiful life, attain happiness, and escape from any danger that might harm him. Sweets indicate that the dreamer will hear kind words. If it is sweet, this means that he will benefit from his children or from his lover. If a person sees sweets in his dream, this indicates the marriage of an unmarried person, the acquisition of money, and abundant profits for those who work and taste the sweetness of faith. When the sweets taste delicious, this means recovery from diseases and gaining positions. High, even if the candy was blowing, this indicates flattery and lies. See also: Interpretation of the dream that I divorced my wife and married another woman in the dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of eating sweets for a single woman. The interpretation of the dream varies according to the social status of the beholder and the circumstances he is going through, but sweets in the dream , As long as it is beautiful and has a delicious taste, it shows a person's abundant goodness in various situations. This is according to what most scholars interpreted of a single girl seeing in a dream that she is eating sweets. Function of the following: Seeing sweets for individuals indicates that they live a stable life and gain beautiful and happy feelings. As for seeing in her dream that she is eating sweets, this indicates that she hears news related to her marriage and this news will be happy. And when an unmarried woman eats sweets in a dream, this means She will obtain everything she has worked to collect throughout her life and it will bring her success, success and achievements in her life. But when a girl eats a lot of sweets, this indicates that she will work to achieve everything she wants and strives for. It is possible that dreaming of sweets in a dream is a sign from God. Almighty God is that an unmarried woman works to think and arrange the affairs of her life. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets with relatives: A person loves sweets in his life and is happy in his sleep when he sees these sweets because of their beautiful taste and wonderful appearance. It varies according to the symbol, but is represented by the following: Seeing eating sweets with the dreamer’s relatives indicates that the dreamer cares about his relatives and works to connect them and strengthen relationships between them. title: Interpretation of a dream about vaginal hair for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hair coming out of the vagina: It is an unpleasant interpretation of visions, and it often comes to warn the dreamer of wrong behavior, which will lead her to a crisis or problem with those around her. Therefore, reading the interpretation of a dream about hair coming out of the vagina for a single, married, or pregnant woman, should be It serves as a warning message to the dreamer, prompting him to reconsider his behavior. Seeing hair coming out of the vulva Seeing hair coming out of the vagina is one of the most hated visions for all dream interpreters. Seeing hair coming out of the vagina is classified as a warning dream that sends a message to its owner of caution. This vision can be preceded by quarrels. And quarrels between the dreamer and those around him. Interpretation of a dream about vaginal hair for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about hair coming out of the vagina for a single woman, should be an incentive to review some of her actions. A dream about hair coming out of the vagina for an unmarried woman means that she is committing some irresponsible actions and that this girl will be rejected because of these undesirable actions. In which for her family, the dream may serve as a warning bell for her before a major problem arises due to these procedures. The interpretation of vaginal hair for a single woman and the interpretation of hair coming out of the vagina for an unmarried woman is the same as the previous interpretation, which suggests that the dreamer has committed something that requires her family or officials to surround her. You may also be interested. B: Removing pubic hair in a dream and its interpretation for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream of hair coming out of the vagina for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of vaginal hair for a married woman from hateful visions because it portends a dispute between her and her husband or between her and her husband’s family. The woman with the dream will be wrong and the cause of this quarrel. Also, the interpretation of the dream of hair coming out of The vagina of a married woman indicates that she will be subjected to severe criticism due to her misbehavior by her husband, father, or whoever takes their place. It is best if a married woman sees in her dream that hair is coming out of her vagina, then she will let go of some of her stubbornness or what she is planning in matters that raise disagreement. Interpretation of a dream Hair coming out of the vagina for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a dream about hair coming out of the vagina for a pregnant woman is also classified under the category of bad visions for the pregnant woman. The interpreters went on to say that it indicates that the dreamer will commit something that deserves reprimand or reprimand. It is said that this is like negligence in taking care of her health or the health of her fetus, which It causes her some health problems. Another group of dream interpreters said that seeing hair coming out of a pregnant woman’s vagina could be insulting words that she hears from people because she is pregnant with a girl and not a boy. The meaning of hair coming out of the vagina in a dream. Most dream interpreters see in the proverb that the meaning of hair coming out From the vagina is one of the bad meanings that does not bring good to the dreamer. The dream of hair coming out of the vagina is a bad omen, because the dreamer will be exposed to ridicule from others because of an action. The more hair that comes out of the vagina in the dream, the more bad words the dreamer will hear from those around her. The dream of hair coming out of the vagina comes as a warning and a warning against wrong behaviors committed by the visionary and a reference to

title: The most important interpretations of seeing bullets in a dream

preview.html: Reasons for the presence of lead in a dream and interpretation of its meaning Exposure to fire or lead in a dream is one of the visions that cause fear for many, especially if the dreamer feels fear during the vision. There are many rumors about the interpretation of this vision in particular, and because of the large number of questions about it, we will provide you with many different interpretations appropriate to the gender and age of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a Dream about Shooting: Shooting her in a person’s dream is an unwanted vision that confirms that she will be exposed to many words that hurt. Her feelings, and if bullets hit her in one of the sensitive parts such as the heart or brain, this is evidence of that. In the coming period, she will suffer from a major psychological wound, either by breaking off the engagement, resigning from her job, or hearing bad words that tarnish her reputation and disgrace her. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is inside a place filled with all kinds of weapons, this means that she will marry a man whose morals are corrupt and treacherous. He doesn't care about her feelings. This vision confirms that her future husband is cheating on her more than once. Unmarried women sitting in a store full of guns in a dream is evidence that she is a reckless girl and that her family looks at her with the eyes of a reckless girl. The blood flowing from the body of an unmarried woman as a result of being hit by a bullet in a dream is evidence that She currently has a lot of money, but because of her excessive spending of money and not keeping it, she will die in the future while she is poor or it could amount to a large penny. Ibn Sirin confirms that seeing an unmarried girl being shot and in pain in a dream indicates that she is suffering from A serious psychological crisis led her to enter into severe bouts of depression. If the dreamer sees that he shot someone he knows, this is evidence that the dreamer wishes to lose the blessing of this person and his intense envy and hatred for him. If the sick dreamer dreams that he has a large gun, this is evidence that God will heal him. However, if he was sick and was shot, this is evidence of his death. If the fortuneteller is preparing to travel outside his country and sees that he has a new, expensive weapon, this means that God will honor him in his travels and he will obtain a lot of money. What is the interpretation of a dream about being shot in the back? Seeing the dreamer injured by a bullet in the back indicates that the dreamer is a person whose intentions are pure and does not envy anyone, but in his life there are many people waiting for him with the intention of harming him greatly. But they hate her very much and are waiting for an opportunity to betray her. For a married woman to see that her husband shot her in the back, this is evidence of her husband’s betrayal, and this betrayal destroys her soul, so she must beware of his actions and deeds. Dreaming of a friend stabbing the dreamer in the back or hitting him with bullets is evidence of treachery. And the deception that will befall him from that treacherous person who wears the guise of a fake friend. Interpretation of a dream that I was injured. If the dreamer dreams that he was injured and the bullet entered his stomach, this indicates that he will be betrayed by someone with his blood or from his house. If the dreamer sees that a bullet hit her in the leg without blood or Pain in the dream, this is evidence that she will move to her husband’s house

title: Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream and its meaning for good and evil

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream and its meaning for good and evil. Many see different types of food in some of them, and some see their favorite meals in a dream. The forms of food that appear in a dream differ between luxurious meals and regular meals that a person eats during his day in real life, and these dreams have meanings and importance. I can talk about the real life of the dreamer, I am very interested to know the interpretation. In this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream and its meaning in good and evil. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pasta in a dream Dream interpretation scholars have suggested that seeing pasta in a dream is a good vision for the dreamer and portends goodness and life. If the dreamer dreams that he is preparing pasta in a dream, this means That he will hear what satisfies him and his family members, and God knows best. When you dream of many colors of pasta in a dream, the meaning of that lies in the abundance of nutrition for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that he is offering pasta to many people in a dream, the meaning of this dream means that the dreamer will pass He has many changes in his life. If he eats small-sized pasta, this is an undesirable sign indicating a bad psychological state. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pasta in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The dream interpreter Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing pasta in a dream is a good vision for the dreamer and expresses the arrival of good news to him. The vision indicates that the dreamer will achieve what he wants. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing pasta in a dream expresses the changes that the dreamer is going through in his life. This vision carries other evidence as well, including that it indicates travel abroad or shows how much the dreamer loves someone In fact. When a married woman sees that she is serving pasta to her family, this is a good sign for her that goodness and happiness will come to her and her family. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pasta according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. The dream interpreter, Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, explained that the dream of pasta is one of the dreams that symbolizes the easing of the situation and the end of Obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life. This vision expresses the dreamer’s reconciliation with a person with whom he was in disagreement, and it is a vision in general that expresses the changes that the dreamer is going through. If the dreamer is suffering from a financial crisis in his life, this vision portends the end of that crisis, and God knows best. When A single person dreams that he is preparing pasta, as this is a dream that symbolizes marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream in which you see yourself eating pasta. If the dreamer dreams that he is eating pasta from a pot, this indicates the dreamer’s good condition and his love for goodness. When the dreamer dreams that many people are eating from a pasta pot, This means that many people will benefit from insight, which is knowledge. When you eat pasta with your hands only, this reflects the positive aspects of the dreamer’s personality, as the vision shows that the dreamer deals humbly with others in reality. But if the dreamer sees that he is eating uncooked pasta, this is an unpleasant dream. For the dreamer, because it indicates recklessness and not taking time and thinking well before
